## IConversationRoom interface

A room is a named conversation with an unlimited amount of members. Rooms has a wide variety of configuration options to control its behaviour.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IConversationRoom extends IStoreItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createdAt](./core-conversations.iconversationroom.createdat.md) | <code>number</code> | A timestamps given as the number of milliseconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00 UTC. This is the same as returned by <code>Date.now()</code> in JavaScript. |
|  [creatorId](./core-conversations.iconversationroom.creatorid.md) | <code>UserId</code> | The ID of the user who created the conversation. |
|  [description](./core-conversations.iconversationroom.description.md) | <code>string</code> | A description of the room, often stating the purpose of it. |
|  [id](./core-conversations.iconversationroom.id.md) | <code>ConversationId</code> | Uniquely identifies a conversation. |
|  [memberCount](./core-conversations.iconversationroom.membercount.md) | <code>number</code> | The number of members of the conversation, including the acting user. |
|  [name](./core-conversations.iconversationroom.name.md) | <code>string</code> | The name of the room. |
|  [type](./core-conversations.iconversationroom.type.md) | <code>'ROOM'</code> |  |
